001package org.nasdanika.maven;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.io.PrintStream;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Map;
009
010import org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo;
011import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
012import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log;
013import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
014import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
015import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
016import org.json.JSONObject;
017import org.nasdanika.common.BeanPropertyComputer;
018import org.nasdanika.common.Command;
019import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
020import org.nasdanika.common.DefaultConverter;
021import org.nasdanika.common.Diagnostic;
022import org.nasdanika.common.DiagnosticException;
023import org.nasdanika.common.PrintStreamProgressMonitor;
024import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
025import org.nasdanika.common.Status;
026import org.nasdanika.common.Util;
027
028/**
029 * Base class for plugins which execute {@link Command}'s. 
030 * This class creates a {@link Context} and a {@link ProgressMonitor} and then executes a command returned from createCommand() method.
031 * Properties of the maven project are available under <code>maven/project</code> prefix in the context. E.g. <code>maven/project/version</code>.
032 */
033public abstract class AbstractCommandMojo extends AbstractMojo {
034
035        /**
036         * File to output progress. If not set, progress is output to the log.
037         */
038        @Parameter      
039        private File progressOutput;    
040
041        /**
042         * File to output diagnostic. If not set, diagnostic is output to the log.
043         */
044        @Parameter      
045        private File diagnosticOutput;  
046        
047        /**
048         * Statuses on which to fail execution. FAIL if empty. Available statuses: FAIL, ERROR, WARNING, SUCCESS, INFO, CANCEL
049         */
050    @Parameter
051    private Status[] failStatuses;
052    
053    /**
054     * URL's of YAML or JSON resources which are loaded as contexts. if the URL ends with .yaml or .yml then it is treated as YAML, as a JSON object otherwise. 
055     */
056    @Parameter
057    private List<String> contexts;
058        
059//      @Parameter(name = "json-progress")      
060//      private boolean jsonProgress;   
061        
062        @Parameter(defaultValue = "${project}", required = true, readonly = true)
063        protected MavenProject project; 
064        
065        
066        /**
067         * Creates a context with {@link MavenProject} service.
068         * Then composes it with contexts loaded from context 
069         * @return
070         * @throws IOException 
071         * @throws MojoExecutionException 
072         */
073        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
074        protected Context createContext() throws IOException, MojoExecutionException {
075                Context context = Context.singleton(MavenProject.class, project).compose(Context.singleton("maven/project", new BeanPropertyComputer(project)));
076                
077                Map<Object, Object> pc = getPluginContext();
078                if (pc != null) {
079                        Context wpc = Context.wrap(pc::get); 
080                        context = context.mount(wpc, "maven/plugin");
081                }
082                
083                if (contexts != null && !contexts.isEmpty()) {
084                        File baseDir = project.getBasedir();
085                        URI baseDirURI = URI.createFileURI(baseDir.getAbsolutePath()).appendSegment("");
086                        
087                        for (String ctxLocation: contexts) {
088                                URI ctxURI = URI.createURI(ctxLocation).resolve(baseDirURI);
089                                String lastSegment = ctxURI.lastSegment().toLowerCase();
090                                if (lastSegment.endsWith(".yml") || lastSegment.endsWith(".yaml")) {
091                                        Object yamlObj = DefaultConverter.INSTANCE.loadYAML(ctxURI);
092                                        if (yamlObj instanceof Map) {
093                                                Map<Object, Object> yamlMap = (Map<Object, Object>) yamlObj;                                            
094                                                context = context.compose(Context.wrap(context.interpolate(yamlMap)::get));
095                                        } else {
096                                                String message = "Context is not a YAML map: " + ctxURI;
097                                                getLog().error(message);
098                                                throw new MojoExecutionException(message); 
099                                        }
100                                } else {
101                                        JSONObject jsonObject = DefaultConverter.INSTANCE.loadJSONObject(ctxURI);
102                                        Map<String, Object> jsonMap = jsonObject.toMap();
103                                        context = context.compose(Context.wrap(context.interpolate(jsonMap)::get));
104                                }
105                        }
106                }
107                
108                return context;
109        }
110        
111        /**
112         * Creates a progress monitor outputting either to the log or to a progress output file.
113         * @return
114         * @throws FileNotFoundException
115         */
116        protected ProgressMonitor createProgressMonitor() throws FileNotFoundException {
117                if (progressOutput == null) {
118                        return new LogProgressMonitor(getLog(), 0, 2);
119                }
120                
121//              if (jsonProgress) {
122//                      // JSON output progress monitor
123//                      
124//              }
125                File parent = progressOutput.getParentFile();
126                if (parent != null) {
127                        parent.mkdirs();
128                }
129                
130                return new PrintStreamProgressMonitor(new PrintStream(progressOutput), 0, 2, true);
131        }
132        
133        /**
134         * @return Command to be executed
135         */
136        protected Command createCommand(Context context) {
137                return new Command() {
138
139                        @Override
140                        public double size() {
141                                return 1;
142                        }
143
144                        @Override
145                        public String name() {
146                                return AbstractCommandMojo.this.getClass().getName();
147                        }
148
149                        @Override
150                        public void execute(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
151                                AbstractCommandMojo.this.execute(context, progressMonitor);                             
152                        }
153                        
154                };
155        }
156        
157        protected abstract void execute(Context context, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor);
158
159        public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
160                Status[] failStatusesArray =  failStatuses == null ? new Status[0] : failStatuses;
161                try {
162                        logDiagnostic(Util.call(createCommand(createContext()), createProgressMonitor(), failStatusesArray));                   
163                } catch (DiagnosticException e) {
164                        MojoExecutionException mojoExecutionException = new MojoExecutionException("Diagnostic exception: " + e, e);
165                        try {
166                                logDiagnostic(e.getDiagnostic());
167                        } catch (FileNotFoundException e1) {
168                                mojoExecutionException.addSuppressed(e1);
169                                throw mojoExecutionException;
170                        }
171                        throw mojoExecutionException;
172                } catch (IOException e) {
173                        throw new MojoExecutionException(e);
174                }
175        }
176        
177        protected void logDiagnostic(Diagnostic diagnostic) throws FileNotFoundException {
178                if (diagnosticOutput == null) {
179                        log(diagnostic, 0, getLog());
180                } else {
181                        File parent = diagnosticOutput.getParentFile();
182                        if (parent != null) {
183                                parent.mkdirs();
184                        }
185                        try (PrintStream out = new PrintStream(diagnosticOutput)) {
186                                diagnostic.dump(out, 0);
187                        }
188                }               
189        }       
190        
191        private static void log(Diagnostic diagnostic, int indent, Log log) {
192                StringBuilder messageBuilder = new StringBuilder();
193                for (int i=0; i < indent; ++i) {
194                        messageBuilder.append("  ");
195                }
196                                
197                messageBuilder.append(diagnostic.getMessage());
198
199                List<Object> data = diagnostic.getData();
200                if (data != null) {
201                        messageBuilder.append(" data=");
202                        messageBuilder.append(diagnostic.getData());
203                }
204                
205                Status status = diagnostic.getStatus();
206                if (status == Status.ERROR) {
207                        log.error(messageBuilder);
208                        if (data != null) {
209                                for (Object de: data) {
210                                        if (de instanceof Throwable) {
211                                                log.error((Throwable) de);
212                                        }
213                                }
214                        }
215                } else if (status == Status.WARNING) {
216                        log.warn(messageBuilder);
217                        if (data != null) {
218                                for (Object de: data) {
219                                        if (de instanceof Throwable) {
220                                                log.warn((Throwable) de);
221                                        }
222                                }
223                        }
224                } else if (status == Status.INFO) {
225                        log.info(messageBuilder);
226                        if (data != null) {
227                                for (Object de: data) {
228                                        if (de instanceof Throwable) {
229                                                log.info((Throwable) de);
230                                        }
231                                }
232                        }
233                } else {
234                        if (status != null) {
235                                messageBuilder.insert(0, "[" + status.name() + "] ");
236                        }
237                        log.debug(messageBuilder);
238                        if (data != null) {
239                                for (Object de: data) {
240                                        if (de instanceof Throwable) {
241                                                log.debug((Throwable) de);
242                                        }
243                                }
244                        }
245                }
246                
247            List<Diagnostic> children = diagnostic.getChildren();
248                if (children != null) {
249                children.forEach(c -> log(c, indent + 1, log));
250            }
251        }       
252        
253}
